definition: to take a bath/to bathe/to immerse
to bathe/to cleanse/to receive/to be given
shower puff/bath sponge/bath ball (containing aromas or salts)
to bathe in a fragrant hot spring (idiom)

sentences.english: We do not have a bath tub, nor a shower on the train.
sentences.chinese: 車上沒有浴盆，也沒有沐浴設備。

sentences.english: Soon, Naaman drove his chariot to the Jordan and followed my command of dipping in the water seven times.
sentences.chinese: 我命令他“在約旦河沐浴七次”。

sentences.english: The Dove range now covers skin creams, shampoos and shower gels .
sentences.chinese: 多芬品牌如今包括護膚霜，洗髮水和沐浴露。

sentences.english: This passage is about the design of injection mould for the gland of ablution fluid bottle.
sentences.chinese: 本文是關於沐浴液瓶壓蓋注塑模具的設計。

sentences.english: Those bring the sunshine to the lives of others , can't help it from themselves.
sentences.chinese: 給別人帶去陽光的人，自己也會沐浴在其中。

sentences.english: Each line, inadvertently are bathed in flowers.
sentences.chinese: 每行一處，不經意間便沐浴在了花香之中。

sentences.english: Best body wash I've been able to find for my sensitive skin.
sentences.chinese: 我是敏感性皮膚，這是我用過的最好的沐浴乳。

sentences.english: They were so sweet. They were bathing us in affection.
sentences.chinese: 他說道，“他們太可愛了，讓我們沐浴在熱情中。”

sentences.english: Dancing and laughing along the beach came the twenty-ninth bather.
sentences.chinese: 跳著，笑著，沿著海灘，第二十九個沐浴者來了。

sentences.english: Even the shower and sleep when wearing, has been wearing to death.
sentences.chinese: 就連沐浴及睡覺時也戴着，一直戴到死。

sentences.english: Tourists and Londoners basked in warm sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊者和倫敦居民沐浴着和煦的陽光。

sentences.english: Great to use in the bath or shower.
Clouds over Manitoba, Canada, are bathed in green light from an August 4 aurora.
sentences.chinese: 8月4日加拿大馬尼巴託上空的雲朵沐浴在綠光之中。

sentences.english: Let me take you to see Li Longjia's personal bath.
sentences.chinese: 我再帶你去看看李隆基自己沐浴的場所。

sentences.english: He will come to us like the winter rains, like the spring rains that water the earth.
sentences.chinese: 他會來到我們身邊，正如冬雨和春雨會沐浴大地。

sentences.english: Let's enjoy the smooth skin brought by our aloevera shower cream.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們享受由蘆薈溫和沐浴乳所帶來的皮膚光滑感。

definition: (of the sunlight) to bathe all things/to shine gloriously
first rays of morning sun/first glimmer of dawn
to wander about unhurriedly/to linger/to loiter
(idiom) sunlight shines over all things/drenched in sunlight
